name: BOYSEN®® Plasolux Glazing Putty B‑311

info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Plasolux Glazing Putty is an alkyd-type product specially made for filling minor surface unevenness on wooden surfaces.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.body: For surfaces previously painted with alkyd, latex or solvent based epoxy coatings, scrape off loosely adhering paint, remove oil and grease by detergent cleaning, then scuff sand.

info.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
info.subtitle: Wooden Surfaces
info.body: Primer: BOYSEN®® Flatwall Enamel White B‑800 or BOYSEN®® Plasolux Primer Surfacer B‑307 Putty: BOYSEN®® Plasolux Glazing Putty B‑311 2nd & 3rd coat: BOYSEN®® Quick Drying Enamel (any desired color)
